Description: Body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice; creamy white slip; interior glazed black with added red and added white dots; below, single red band; exterior: painted decoration consisting of light brown toes of male foot to right and traces of a heel on the right; below, two narrow lines above double guilloche pattern in handle zone.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 277, no. 747, pl. III)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0792) (phase 2)
